summary.span: Der -Namespace enthält die erforderlichen Klassen zur Erstellung und Verwendung sichtbarer Dienste.

span.span: The namespace contains the classes required for the creation and use of discoverable services.

summary.span: Diese Klassen implementieren die Version Committee Draft 1 des WS-Discovery-Protokolls für Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

span.span: These classes implement the Committee Draft 1 version of the WS-Discovery protocol for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).
